extendedInfo.description: It's simple and straightforward, and it will keep your kids occupied for a surprisingly long time. Just tap the colored balls to pop them. There are two catches: You have to tap balls of the right color, and missing a ball will create a new one. Settings let you control the size, speed, and number of balls in play, and enable sound effects.- Pass the time with a fun, colorful game for kids- Tap correctly colored balls to pop them--and don't miss- Enable sound effects, and vary size, speed, and number of balls
